title: Stage Lv9-P3-S14
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It is evident that our strategy needs revision.
It is clear that market conditions have fundamentally changed.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 우리 전략을 수정해야 한다는 것이 분명합니다.
sentences.en: It is evident that our strategy needs revision.
It is clear that market conditions have fundamentally changed.
It is apparent that additional resources are required.

sentences.kr: 현재 접근법이 효과적이지 않다는 것이 명백합니다.
sentences.en: It is obvious that the current approach is not effective.

sentences.kr: 기술 혁신이 핵심적인 역할을 한다는 것이 분명합니다.
sentences.en: It is evident that technological innovation plays a crucial role.

sentences.kr: 고객 만족도가 비즈니스 성공의 핵심이라는 것이 명확합니다.
sentences.en: It is clear that customer satisfaction is key to business success.
It is evident that a comprehensive review is necessary.

sentences.kr: 비용 효율성을 개선해야 한다는 것이 명백합니다.
sentences.en: It is apparent that cost efficiency must be improved.
